publicwhip.spmotion: S2M-4256 Death of Calum Kennedy (lodged on 19 April 2006) Margaret Mitchell*, Mr Alasdair Morrison*, Mr David Davidson*, John Scott*, Mrs Nanette Milne*, Mr Brian Monteith*, Donald Gorrie*, Mr Bruce McFee*

S2M-4256 Mr Ted Brocklebank: Death of Calum Kennedy—That the Parliament notes the sad death of the greatest Gaelic singer of his generation, Calum Kennedy; remembers the massive contribution he made to the Scottish folk tradition, including innumerable editions of Grampian TV’s "Calum’s Ceilidh", and offers sincere condolences to his immediate family and to Calum’s extended family of fans from all airts of Scotland and beyond. Supported by: Bruce Crawford, Mr Jamie Stone, Jim Mather, Robin Harper, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Karen Gillon, Alex Johnstone, Tricia Marwick, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Alex Neil, John Farquhar Munro, Ms Sandra White, Brian Adam, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton, Nora Radcliffe, Eleanor Scott, Ms Maureen Watt, Rob Gibson, Margaret Mitchell, Mr Alasdair Morrison, Mr David Davidson, John Scott, Mrs Nanette Milne, Mr Brian Monteith, Donald Gorrie, Mr Bruce McFee
S2M-4256 Death of Calum Kennedy (lodged on 19 April 2006) Murdo Fraser*, Phil Gallie*, Shiona Baird*
S2M-4256 Death of Calum Kennedy (lodged on 19 April 2006) Michael Matheson*, Fiona Hyslop*
S2M-4256 Death of Calum Kennedy (lodged on 19 April 2006) Linda Fabiani*
